__e: You want me to read in front of living people... who are there to hear me read.
That's right, it's the living part they got a problem with.
Yet here we are,in the presence of two people still living, yet no longer bound in the eyes of the church.
Only three people went to heaven alive.
Three cheers for Homer, minus the one we gave him already.
They want him for some sort of living weapons program to control his mind and use his powers.
But in truth, I think I am someone... who can only feel things... when they are alive to me.
But I want you to live to see our son be king.
Yeah, so do we, these people, still here, alive, and in our way.
We are alive, and all the others, it is they who are dead.
Let's just assume they're alive and then their chances are better,right?
